descriptionMarkdown: A simple, infinitely repeatable and upgrade-able design for an any-size smeltery that only requires that you have Electric Energy Distribution 1 and Logistics unlocked. I'm using Factorissimo2 so that I don't have to do the manual power distribution, but the design will work without. All of the parts (minus the long-handed inserters and medium power poles) are interchangeable, so if you're really early on, then you can use stone furnaces instead. To expand the furnace amount, simply make the belts for the coal and iron ore longer vertically, where they meet the inserters. The blueprint is the smallest size possible, just as a base, and the design probably isn't 100% efficient, but I'm too lazy to fix it, and it's getting late, so I don't care, but I'd love to see someone try to fix it, because I certainly couldn't.
title: Customizable and Resizeable Smeltery Design
